name: hacker-tracker
description: Self-hosted app for alerts based on Hacker News posts and comments

scripts.dev: pnpm run db:setup && concurrently "pnpm run frontend" "pnpm run backend"
scripts.db:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres postgres_test
scripts.db:setup: pnpm run db:init && pnpm --filter migrations db:setup && pnpm run db:init:test && pnpm --filter migrations db:setup:test
scripts.db:reset: pnpm run db:init && pnpm --filter migrations db:reset && pnpm run db:init:test && pnpm --filter migrations db:reset:test
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm run build && pnpm run db:setup
